title: Mahindra holidays plans to double room count
description: "We are committed to take advantage of the tailwinds that are there in the leisure business. The branded leisure rooms in our country are only 28,000. If you were to compare that to Phuket and Bali, we are much smaller. Phuket would be about 40,000, while Bali would be above 60,000. We are so underserved and we believe there is a huge opportunity for us to increase the footprint in leisure hospitality," said Singh.
